sentences.en: And in this work we must not overlook the weakest among us.
sentences.cn: 在这期间,我们决不能忽视我们当中最柔弱者.

sentences.en: Chamber - pot Tu's a sly one --- too sly to overlook you!
sentences.cn: 屠 夜壶 多么精细,会忘记了你!

sentences.en: Companies are so busy analysing the financial implications that they overlook the effect on workers .
sentences.cn: 公司忙于分析此事对财务可能产生的影响，而忽视了其对工人的影响。

sentences.en: How could you overlook paying the rent?
How stupid to overlook such an obvious mistake!
sentences.cn: 把这样明显的错误都忽略过去了,多窝囊呀!

sentences.en: I shall overlook your disobedience this time.
sentences.cn: 这次,我不计较你不服从.

sentences.en: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.cn: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.en: Nobody could overlook the fact that box office sales were down.
sentences.cn: 谁也无法忽视票房销售额在下降这个事实。
我们的房间可以俯视大海。

sentences.en: Pretty and comfortable rooms overlook a flower-filled garden.
sentences.cn: 漂亮舒适的房间俯视着花团锦簇的花园。

sentences.en: Romantic chateaux and castles overlook the river's twisting course.
sentences.cn: 富有浪漫气息的庄园和城堡俯瞰着蜿蜒的河道。

sentences.en: She found him entertaining enough to overlook his faults.
sentences.cn: 她觉得他很有趣，足以让她包容他的缺点。

sentences.en: The owners don't want to overlook any opportunity to make a buck.
sentences.cn: 老板们不想错过任何可以赚钱的机会。

sentences.en: We can overlook the whole of the harbor on the hillside.
sentences.cn: 我们在山腰上可以俯视整个港口.

sentences.en: We decided to overlook his mistake.
sentences.cn: 我们决定宽容他的过错.

sentences.en: We should not overlook the difficulties.
You cannot live in a cocoon and overlook these facts.
sentences.cn: 你不能自己缩在套子里而忽略这些事实。

sentences.en: You overlook the pressure you're under and what it does to you.
sentences.cn: 你忽视了你所承受的压力及它带给你的后果。

trans.tran_cn: 俯瞰，忽略，不理会，不考虑，宽容
trans.tran_en: to fail to see or notice sth
to not notice something, or not see how important it is
to not notice something, or not see how important it is
